practices.name: 45 degree knee highs
practices.description:
•Keep your core tight
	•Knees as high as possible
	•Heels off the ground

practices.name: Explosive burpees
practices.description:
•Put your body out flat in a hand plank position
	•Lift your knees up as high as you can when you jump

practices.name: Ladder Drills
practices.description:
•Try and match arm speed with leg speed
	•One foot in the ladder followed by the next foot. Then the same foot that first went in, take it out, followed by the other

practices.name: Front and Side step shuffle
practices.description:
•Whichever foot is on the step, the opposite arm is up
	•Push off of the step while switching arms and legs

practices.name: Parallel Bands
practices.description:
•All movement is done on the balls of your feet
	•Arm speed matches leg speed

practices.name: Rhythmic V-kicks
practices.description:
•Use anything that is narrow with 2 sides (door, corner of a plyo box)
	•Try to keep consistent rhythm

practices.name: Speed skater with cone touch
practices.description:
•The arm that touches is opposite from the leg that’s on the floor
	•Put cones far enough that you have to jump to reach

practices.name: Bench knee flutter kicks to knee crunches
practices.description:
•Lean back and flex your toes
	•Bring your chest towards your knees and away at the same speed as your knees toward your chest

practices.name: Hand plank stability ball knee ups
practices.description:
•Place ball anywhere from your toes to your knees
	•Use the full range of your specific motion

practices.name: Med ball
practices.description:
•Touch the ball to the side of the straight leg
	•Keep feet elevated the whole time

practices.name: Standing single arm obliques
practices.description: •Lean as far as you can sideways on both sides

practices.name: Superman
practices.description:
•Lock your knees straight
	•Arms come completely off the mat

practices.name: V-Ups
practices.description:
•Opposite hand touches the opposite foot
	•Arms and legs move at the same time

practices.name: Dumbbell squat to arm snatch
practices.description:
•Dumbbell is in between your feet when touching the floor
	•Let your elbow lead the way snatching the dumbbell

practices.name: Dumbbell squat to twisting millitary press
practices.description:
•Weights go no lower than shoulders when squatting
	•Feet stay straight while twisting

practices.name: Stationary lunge to hammer curl press
practices.description:
•Touch the floor with dumbbells
	•Arms go straight up and not at an angle

practices.name: Med ball push up to burpee
practices.description:
•Let your chest touch the ball if possible
	•Place the ball straight above the head

practices.name: Standing dumbbell woodchop
practices.description:
•Place dumbbell outside of the front knee 
	•Keep shoulders as upright as possible

practices.name: Weighted spider-man push ups
practices.description:
•The arm that is the most forward is opposite of the knee that is most forward
	•The exercise can be done with or without the foot plates

practices.name: Curtsy lunge
practices.description:
•Stationary foot stays straight
	•Keep your shoulders as far back as possible while going down

practices.name: Dumbbell walking lunges
practices.description: •Go low but do not let your knee touch the floor

practices.name: Lateral lunge with plate slide
practices.description:
•Keep trailing leg stiff while dragging the plate
	•Keep more pressure on the heel of the lead leg

practices.name: Med ball pump and jump
practices.description: •Put the pressure on your heels on the squat

practices.name: Single leg negative sit squats
practices.description:
•Off leg is parallel to the floor
	•Go down with a controlled slower speed

practices.name: Single leg bench squat
practices.description:
•Don’t let your knee go out further than your foot
	•The majority of pressure is on the heel of the front foot

practices.name: Alternating frontal and lateral deltoid lifts
practices.description: •Bring up arms so they are parallel to the floor

practices.name: Dumbbell alternating drop chest press
practices.description: •The middle of the dumbbells should be over the middle of your chest

practices.name: Incline bench dumbbell rows
practices.description: •Squeeze your back while driving your elbows backwards

practices.name: Press pull biceps curls
practices.description:
•After curling the dumbbells press them forward
	•Bring them back quickly

practices.name: Rollie pollie med ball push up
practices.description: •Keep the ball as close to the shoulder as possible

practices.name: Stability ball triceps extension
practices.description:
•Place ball anywhere in between your heels and knees
	•Back should graze the bench on the way down
